import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {useEffect} from 'react' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' import LoginForm from "../../components/form/LoginForm" import RegisForm from "../../components/form/RegisForm" import SlideForm from "../../components/form/SlideForm" import Logo from '../../assets/logo.png' import styles from "./Auth.module.css" const Auth = () => { const history = useHistory() const { auth } = useSelector(state => state) const isDesktop = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-width: 1224px)' }) useEffect(() => { if(auth.token) history.push("/") }, [auth.token, history]) return (
) } export default Auth
